entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then becoming west 20. High 17. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 14.
